treasury_media.title: "Building a Culture of Trust" Final Keynote IA-Conference Cologne Germany 2010 #iak10
treasury_media.description:
"In the final keynote at the Information Architect Conference Cologne 2010 I talked about the importance of trust and focused specifically on Service Dominant Logic and Value Co-Creation.

The message I wanted the audience to leave with: We are all part of the same system and we are in a constant reshuffle. It is important that we keep learning each others languages and work together. This is why design thinking is becoming increasingly relevant for multidisciplinary teams. It gives us the mindset and tools to learn and be open minded.

Design Thinking is the Glue between all disciplines."

projects.title: Designing Services with Innovative Methods
projects.description: This book presents the emerging and increasingly important field of service design. Birgit Mager, Köln International School of Design and Service Design Network, Ezio Manzini, Politecnico di Milano, and Stefan Holmlid, University of Linköping, discuss how: – Design thinking and innovative methods work as tools for co-creating services and desirable value propositions. Service design is a tool for designing a more sustainable society. Interaction design offers us insight into creating more user-oriented services. Design practitioners Fran Samalionis from IDEO, Arne van Oosterom from DesignThinkers and Paul Thurston from thinkpublic share their service design thinking and the benefits of the service design process for both companies and for the public sector. Various service design case studies from different business areas and different cultural contexts are presented and described in detail, and this book opens the discussion on designers’ methods and approaches to developing services.

projects.title: JTBC (Korea) - Corporate identity
projects.description: The military leaders of South Korea in 1980 banned the popular TV station TBC. Now, thirty years later, TBC reappears as JTBC, the fourth Korean terrestrial broadcaster. Bourne was called in to develop a brand platform and a visual identity for the station that had very ambitious plans. The result is a big success: Bourne created a distinguishing design program, including a custom typeface in both English and Korean script, that defined JTBC as the new look of Korean television.

profile_positions.description:
We will open our doors in 2024. 

At Future Skills Academy, we believe that the future belongs to those who continuously strive to learn, grow and share what they've learned. To that end we provide three types of services:

Future Skills Courses - Providing tailor-made training programs for teams and organisations.

Future Skills Inside - Providing academy services for agencies who wish to offer industry relevant training programs for their clients.

Future Skills Coaching – Supporting individuals to  develop their unique future leadership skills.

We help people, teams, and organizations get ready for a changing world.
We recognize the urgency for adaptability, resilience, and continuous learning in the increasingly complex world we live and work in.

We cover a variety of domains, including new leadership, digital transformation, collaboration, innovation, and emotional intelligence.

The programs are led by experienced specialists who have worked with leading companies across various sectors.

Join us at Future Skills Academy and become a part of our growing community.

Reach out to us for more info >info@futureskills.academy

profile_positions.description: I'm the partner for development, execution and rollout of design thinking training programs globally, coaching UA Team member, growing a Design Thinking community and help scale design thinking within Under Armour.
profile_positions.title: Design Thinking Training Lead & Coach

profile_positions.description:
Creative Leaders Unplugged, the podcast where we unveil the personal journeys, origin stories, and pivotal moments of innovative and inspiring leaders. Each episode we'll bring you intimate conversations with change agents from diverse industries, as they share their unique paths, transformative experiences, and the lessons they've learned along the way. Join us as we uncover the human side of creative leadership and explore the moments that have shaped these extraordinary individuals.

This is Creative Leaders Unplugged—let's get started!
profile_positions.title: Podcast Host

profile_positions.description:
DK&A is a strategic design consultancy helping clients generate fresh market strategies and turn ideas into new products and services. Services include: the DK&A Sprint Track; Design Vision & Strategy; Service & Experience Design; Leadership Coaching; Design & Innovation Management.

Clients include: SAP; High Speed Two; Richemont; Orange; NHS; Thames & Hudson; What Design Can Do; Boskke; Ministry of Justice.
profile_positions.title: Associate Creative Director

profile_positions.description: We Are Story. Through story we connect and understand the world. We help individuals, teams and organisations discover & craft their own story to connect to people on an emotional level.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Storyteller

profile_positions.description:
I am a seasoned creative facilitator, leadership coach, trainer, and keynote speaker.

I have dedicated my career to inspiring and empowering individuals and organizations across the globe.

In 2006, I founded DesignThinkers Group and DesignThinkers Academy, which have grown to encompass teams in over 25 countries, making them leading forces in the world of innovation.

In 2020, I established Blue Sky Republic to create a nurturing haven for change agents, innovators, generalists, misfits, and all those with an open mind, working together to stretch the limits of what’s possible.

My expertise is sought after by an wide range of clients, including startups, governments, and renowned companies like Under Armour, Coca Cola, Volkswagen, BOSCH, Philips, SAP, ING Bank, Estée Lauder, Cartier, and L’Oréal.

Through my work, I aim to inspire, teach, connect, and challenge conventional thinking, leading the charge towards a brighter, more innovative future.
profile_positions.title: Executive Coach & Creative Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
Design Thinking is the glue between all disciplines.

DesignThinkers Group is one of the leading ‘design driven’ Innovation community organizations. We facilitate organizations around the world making the transition from being strictly product orientated and sales driven, towards being service orientated and human centered. We are a Global Agency, represented in 18 countries and train, develop and facilitate creative multidisciplinary teams and communities to drive positive change.

Design Thinking is a mindset to develop and deliver innovative ideas, change and solutions to complicated problems. It is an activity-based process with a strong emphasis on teamwork and co-creation. Our mission is to provide space and time for teams and individuals to be inspired and challenged, to ‘learn-by-doing’ and strengthen their ability for creative problem solving and help organizations build the necessary environment and mind-set.

www.designthinkersgroup.com
